channel.title: eqtl on MerrimanLab
channel.description: Recent content in eqtl on MerrimanLab

item.title: cis-eQTL
item.description: Repo: https://github.com/MerrimanLab/QTL_pipelines This pipeline runs a co-localisation analysis using a list of key SNPs, a GWAS results file, and the GTEx dataset. bash cis_eqtl_pipeline.sh my_gwas.txt my_snplist.txt 1000000 8
